DiscordBot.clientID: Client ID from Discord Dev portal for the bot
DiscordBot.clientSecret: Client Secret from the Discord Dev Portal.
DiscordBot.callbackURL: Call back url. For logging into the website
DiscordBot.ownerID: Owner ID. Gives you access to a few more commands :)
DiscordBot.oLogs: Other logs channel id (Currently used for namechanges and linking logs)

DB.MongoDB: MongoDB connection (forgot what this is for but give it one anyway)

mongoURI: //provide mongoURI HERE PLS THANKS. FOR TAGS SYSTEM.

Pterodactyl.hosturl: Pterodactyl URL (Dont put the / on the end) Example: https://your.panel.com
Pterodactyl.apikey: Pterodactyl ADMIN Api key. Where to find? add admin/api to the end of your panel domain
Pterodactyl.apikeyclient: Pterodactyl CLIENT Api key. Find it: add account/api to the end of your panel domain

Proxmox.url: Proxmox (Not used yet so ignore this)
Proxmox.auth: Proxmox (Not used yet so ignore this)
Proxmox.username: Proxmox (Not used yet so ignore this)
Proxmox.password: Proxmox (Not used yet so ignore this)

SSH.Host: SSH Host (Used for Proxy servers right now)
